design_philosophy.core_concept: A high-precision 'Control Room' interface for automotive tuning. Dark, industrial, and data-dense. It should feel like the software used to map an ECUâ€”functional, sharp, and electric.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode Only. High contrast neon accents against deep carbon backgrounds. Grid lines visible. No soft shadows, only sharp definitions.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Chivo' for all page titles and section headers. Weight: 700 or 900. Tracking: tight.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Manrope' for all UI text, labels, and table data. It handles numbers exceptionally well.
usage_rules.mono: MANDATORY for: VINs, Registration Plates, ECU Codes, Engine Codes, and File Hashes.

primary.name: Ignition Amber
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, Key Metrics

structure.dashboard: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Widgets must stretch to fill height.
structure.forms: Max-width 2xl. Single column on mobile, two columns on desktop for dense data entry.
structure.lists: Table-based or 'Card-List' hybrid. Dense rows with mono-font identifiers.

cards.implementation: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800 backdrop-blur-sm. No shadow. Sharp corners or rounded-sm.

buttons.primary: bg-amber-500 text-black hover:bg-amber-400 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(245,158,11,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 text-white hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-zinc-700 rounded-sm

inputs.style: bg-zinc-950/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-amber-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-amber-500 rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

status_badges.style: rounded-full px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider border

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle 'noise' overlay on the main background to give it a gritty, industrial feel.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'tracing beam' effects on active cards or key metrics.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Lucide React. Use thin strokes (1.5px) to match the technical vibe.

login_hero.alt: Silver sports car front end in dark studio
login_hero.usage: Full height background on login page with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80).

dashboard_bg.usage: Subtle background texture for dashboard header area.

job_placeholder.usage: Default image for jobs without photos.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA. Amber text on black is high contrast. Avoid dark grey on black.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (Amber-500) are mandatory for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion for any glowing/tracing effects.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Chivo', 'Manrope', and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.css.
2. THEME: Override the Tailwind config to use the 'Zinc' scale for neutrals and 'Amber' for primary.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'DashboardLayout' component first using the 'Control Room' grid logic.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove excessive rounded corners (use rounded-sm or rounded-md max).
5. DATA: Use the 'mono' font for all technical data (VIN, Reg, Codes) to ensure precision.
6. MOCK: Mock all API calls initially. Create a 'mockData.js' file with realistic car/job data.
7. TOASTS: Use 'sonner' for all notifications (Success: Tune Saved, Error: Upload Failed).
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all inputs and buttons.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors with noise texture.
Do not center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
